title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 470.5 - Validity and limitations
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 470.5 - Validity and limitations

State Regulations
(a) A
firearms license issued by the superintendent becomes valid upon the member's
separation from service, and any prior license issued by local authority
transferred to the superintendent pursuant to section
470.4
of this Part is null and void. (b) There is no limit as to the number of firearms that may be licensed by the
superintendent, subject to the restriction below. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
470.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
